name: .SAF File Extension
summary: Learn about .SAF files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An SAF file is a map created by DeLorme Street Atlas USA, a custom mapping and GPS navigation program for Windows. It contains a detailed digital map of a specific area, along with associated data such as the map center coordinates, zoom level, and user-defined settings. It may also include custom routes, points of interest, and user-added layers for planning or navigation purposes.

content: ​DeLorme released the first version of Street Atlas USA in 1991. Over the years, DeLorme has updated and enhanced Street Atlas USA, incorporating various features, including GPS navigation and route planning. The software remained popular among travelers, businesses, and mapping enthusiasts until its discontinuation following Garmin's acquisition of DeLorme in 2016.
SAF files saved by Street Atlas USA allowed users to reopen their saved maps with all their preferences and additions intact. The software automatically saved the files in the following directory:

instructions: You can open SAF files with DeLorme Street Atlas USA in Windows. However, the software is discontinued.
